scene_description_enriched: A bearded man, identified as Saint Christopher, carries the Christ Child on his shoulders. Saint Christopher is depicted with a long staff in his right hand, looking upwards. The Christ Child, with a halo, is seated on his shoulders, holding a globe in his left hand and raising his right hand in blessing. They are shown in an outdoor setting with a body of water in the foreground and distant hills or mountains under a blue sky. The figures are richly robed, with Saint Christopher wearing a blue tunic and a red cloak draped over his shoulders, and the Christ Child in a light-colored garment.
